mil3.7.9:1.2: “bhante nagasena, atthi koci, yo imina sarirena uttarakurum va gaccheyya, brahmalokam va, annam va pana dipan”ti?
mil3.7.9:1.3: “Atthi, maharaja, yo imina catummahabhutikena kayena uttarakurum va gaccheyya, brahmalokam va, annam va pana dipan”ti.
mil3.7.9:2.1: “Katham, bhante nagasena, imina catummahabhutikena kayena uttarakurum va gaccheyya, brahmalokam va, annam va pana dipan”ti?
mil3.7.9:2.2: “Abhijanasi nu tvam, maharaja, imissa pathaviya vidatthim va ratanam va langhita”ti?
mil3.7.9:2.3: “Ama, bhante, abhijanami ‘aham, bhante nagasena, atthapi rataniyo langhemi’”ti.
mil3.7.9:2.5: “Ahanhi, bhante, cittam uppademi ‘ettha nipatissami’ti saha cittuppadena kayo me lahuko hoti”ti.
mil3.7.9:2.6: “Evameva kho, maharaja, iddhima bhikkhu cetovasippatto kayam citte samaropetva cittavasena vehasam gacchati”ti.
